content: this is a legal document regarding a divorce by mutual consent between mr and his wife mrs they have agreed on the division of their mutual rights and have provided a detailed statement of their community property debts fees and agreements the document outlines the allocation of various assets and liabilities including furniture personal belongings money securities bank accounts jewelry and shares in a company it also addresses the custody of their three minor children financial contributions and benefits for the spouses the father agrees to pay a monthly amount for the childrens expenses and a onetime support benefit to the wife the costs of the divorce procedure will be shared equally between the parties the document also includes agreements regarding inheritance rights residence and care of the children and the financial consequences of the divorce the agreements will be effective once the divorce decree is finalized and will be binding on third parties the parties have filed a joint petition for divorce and have complied with the necessary legal requirements the notary has confirmed the identity of the parties and their compliance with the mortgage act the parties acknowledge their rights and obligations and have signed the document
